title: System Analyst
longText: SYSTEM ANALYST GlobalLogic üîπ–õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü—ñ—è: Ukraine(Kyiv,Lviv) (Remote) Job Description Upper - Intermediate English; Very strong verbal and written communication skills; 4+ years professional experience in IT; Awareness of the latest IT industry and digitalization trends; Experience with: Requirements analysis, system analysis; Working in an international distributed teams; Clear understanding of SDLC processes and phases; Experience with different delivery processes and practices (Agile, SCRUM, Kanban); Autonomous / self-starter; Collaborates in a team effectively; Resourceful; Experience with OpenAPI (Swagger), Postman. Desirable Business education; Product Management experience; Master degree or higher (in Computer Science or similar); Knowledge of different API‚Äôs (e.g. Social Networks, Payment Gateways, Google services, etc.); Engineering background; Job Responsibilities Working in an international distributed team; Communicate with PM, PO, other engineers, architects, QA and other colleagues and stakeholders; Participation on delivering processes; Working with technical documentations; Support of developers: an important part of the process is to unblock developers work by creating test accounts, test/sandbox environments to test connectors and populate them with data. This greatly varies in difficulty/complexity. Some examples of this work: Create a Stripe account and hit their HTTP API to populate the sandbox account Create a google Ads account, run a small ads campaign (including creating any taglines, sample images, etc..) to populate the account with data the connector can test. This is needed because GoogleAds doesn‚Äôt offer a sandbox (medium difficulty, requires good autonomy) Create a Shopify store, populate it with fake products, purchase some subscriptions from the store, and connect it to Recharge, a subscription payments platform, to test our Recharge connector (harder, requires good autonomy) This could also involve emailing or calling partnership or sales teams to explain to them what Airbyte is and why we need this account etc. Project Description Airbyte is an open source data portability tool. It allows users to move their data across APIs, databases, data warehouses, and data lakes in all directions. Most companies have data spread across different services and systems and the volume of this data is growing. In order to make the best decisions, companies are looking for a way to consolidate this data into the warehouse or date lake of their choice and then ask data scientists and business analysts to extract insights in order to build a competitive edge. There are existing cloud solutions today with Fivetran and StitchData but both fall short in the number of connectors that they provide. This results in companies having to build and maintain a secondary system internally to accommodate missing connectors. Also both Fivetran and StitchData are cloud solutions which means that many companies can‚Äôt work with these services because they cannot let data leave their premises for security reasons. Airbyte solves the following problems: Provide an open-source solution so organizations can contribute the connectors that are missing thus addressing all connectors Provide a self-hosted solution to solve the security problem Disrupt existing pricing models that are most of the time based on volume.

title: ASO Manager
longText: ASO MANAGER WinTech üîπ–õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü—ñ—è: Ukraine (Remote) Overview WinTech provides end-to-end marketing and growth offerings, leveraging our skilled team's forward-thinking techniques and extensive industry insights to enable businesses to prosper in competitive markets. WinTech Digital: Redefining Marketing Services Our unique approach sets us apart from conventional providers, as we develop and manage our own websites, steer users towards partner companies, and participate in revenue-sharing and CPA models. This cultivates enduring, mutually beneficial partnerships, positioning ourselves as an extension of your marketing efforts rather than a mere outsourced agency. The team You will be joining a rapidly growing team of over 10 highly talented individuals who thrive in our fast-paced, 100% remote work environment. As we anticipate onboarding more than 50 people within the next 12 months, our team boasts international representation and a passion for building top-quality websites and expanding the business. About the role WinTech is seeking a skilled and experienced ASO (App Store Optimization) Manager to join our dynamic mobile app marketing team. As an ASO Manager, you will be responsible for optimizing our mobile applications' visibility and discoverability in app stores, driving app downloads, and increasing user engagement. Your expertise in ASO will play a key role in the success of our mobile app projects and contribute to the growth of our company. What you'll do - Develop and implement effective ASO strategies to improve our mobile apps' rankings, visibility, and organic downloads in app stores, such as Google Play and Apple App Store. - Conduct thorough keyword research, analysis, and optimization to improve app discoverability and maximize relevant organic traffic. - Collaborate with the mobile app development, design, and marketing teams to create visually appealing and informative app store assets, including app icons, screenshots, and preview videos. - Monitor and analyze app store performance metrics, user feedback, and competitor activities to identify trends, insights, and opportunities for further optimization. - Continuously research and stay up-to-date with the latest ASO best practices, industry trends, and app store algorithm changes. - Contribute to mobile app marketing efforts by coordinating with the User Acquisition team to align paid and organic strategies and sharing insights to improve overall marketing performance. About you - Proven experience in ASO, preferably for both Android and iOS platforms. - Strong knowledge of app store ranking algorithms, keyword optimization techniques, and best practices. - Experience with ASO tools such as App Follow, App Tweak, or App Radar. - Familiarity with mobile app marketing strategies and user acquisition channels. - Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and data-driven decision-making skills. - Experience in Gambling ASO. - Strong communication and collaboration skills. - Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, dynamic, and results-driven environment. Benefits - Flexible, remote working environment - Unlimited PTO - Work with incredibly talented colleagues Life at WinTech Digital At WinTech Digital, you'll join a supportive and collaborative team passionate about excellence and being industry leaders. Our innovative work environment drives impactful business results as we challenge ourselves and elevate each other to achieve new heights. Equal Opportunity All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, color, religion, national origin, disability, protected Veteran status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law.

title: Finance Analyst
longText: FINANCE ANALYST Mine Marketing üîπ–õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü—ñ—è: Ukraine (Remote) Mine Marketing is looking for a top-talented Financial Accountant. Requirements: - 2+ years of experience in Accounting on remote basis - Be proficient in the latest financial management software, including accounting packages specific to your industry. - Have Fluent or Advanced level of English is a must - Strong skills in tools like Tableau, enabling the visualization of financial data for easier understanding and decision-making. - Advanced knowledge of Excel for financial modeling, data analysis, API automation and reporting. - Ability to integrate various financial tools and software to provide a seamless flow of data and automate processes. - Stay updated on the latest financial tools, technologies, and best practices through courses, webinars, and certifications. Responsibilities: - Invoice Management (Team and Tech & Operations): Handle all incoming and outgoing invoices, ensuring they are accurate, timely, and properly recorded. - Track and manage team attendance to ensure payroll accuracy and productivity optimization. - Salary Management & Payouts: Oversee the entire payroll process, ensuring timely and accurate salary payouts, including bonuses, deductions, and other compensations. - P/L (Profit and Loss) Management: Analyze and manage the company's profit and loss statements, identifying areas for potential improvement. - Provide comprehensive and timely financial reports to the main financial manager, highlighting key metrics, trends, and areas of concern. - Collaborate on financial forecasting, helping to anticipate and address potential financial challenges. - Actively monitor and manage the company's liquidity, ensuring operational needs are met and there's no interruption in business continuity. - Financial Analysis: Use data analytics to assess the company's financial health and make recommendations based on findings. - Monitor and suggest cost-reducing strategies, while ensuring quality isn't compromised. - Assist with Audits: Act as a point of contact and assist external auditors, ensuring all necessary documentation is in order and processes are transparent. - Continually review and recommend improvements to the financial control processes to enhance accuracy and efficiency. - Maintain awareness of industry financial benchmarks and market trends to ensure competitive positioning. - Financial Automation : Identify processes that can be automated for efficiency and implement appropriate financial software or tools to do so through API or any other tools. - Collaborate with various teams to align financial goals with operational objectives and provide financial insights for departmental projects. - Monitor amounts owed to the company and amounts the company owes, ensuring timely collections and payments. What we offer: - Part-time working day (4 hours/day) - Opportunities for professional development and personal growth üöÄ - Competitive salary, reasonable and fair working conditions üíµ - A ridiculously awesome team and work environment üéâ - Training opportunities, including paid courses and webinars üíª - Remote working conditions üè† - Generous PTO and Holidays üå¥

title: Data Science / Machine Learning Engineer
text: Data Science / Machine Learning Engineer üè¢–ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω—ñ—è: ScrumLaunch üìç–õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü—ñ—è: Ukraine (Remote)
longText: DATA SCIENCE / MACHINE LEARNING ENGINEER ScrumLaunch üîπ–õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü—ñ—è: Ukraine (Remote) Our Mission We're not just about data; we're about reinventing how data shapes our lives and the experiences we have. Founded in 2021, our commitment has always been dual-fold: pushing the boundaries of technological innovation and ensuring that every decision centers around humanity. What you‚Äôll do You will shape and re-define the data ecosystem, for the hospitality and travel industry. We are driven by the mission to empower genuine connections, and our technological solutions are at the heart of this pursuit. We believe in pushing boundaries and transforming the way we experience the world, together. We are seeking an exceptional Data Science / Machine Learning Engineer with a deep understanding of large data models, big data, AI, and ML. As the first founding person into this role, you will play an integral part in our business as you bring your solid understanding of market data, product empathy, and product ownership. You‚Äôll also enjoy product facing and not be afraid to roll up your sleeves and get your hands dirty as you lead and drive out building models. About Us We‚Äôre a remote first company that believes in the power of exploring new places, people and experiences to help us all grow and build together. We encourage working from the place that gives you the most joy. What you‚Äôll bring: - Strong quantitative reasoning skills with an emphasis on statistical estimation/modeling, time series analysis, and machine learning; - Demonstrated research ability on large, real-world datasets. Though specific education attainment is not required, candidates should be qualified to perform original research at a graduate level in econometrics or a related field; - Ability to communicate statistical analyses via visualizations and written communication; - Experience in one or more of the following technologies or frameworks: python, pandas, numpy, scikit-learn; Ability to work hours that overlap with US schedules - our team is primarily in the Americas and Europe (when outside the US the role is structured as an independent contractor). Key Responsibilities: You‚Äôll be responsible for developing statistical models that infer the preferences of consumers and predict future travel behavior for the industry. Building these models requires expertise in analyzing a diverse set of heterogeneous data, accounting for differences in geography, desirability, and other market dynamics. You‚Äôll partner closely with engineers, designers, and product managers to incorporate the results of their modeling into the product, providing insight, guidance, and interpretation for our customers. Data Processing: Extract and preprocess phone metadata for structured datasets. Feature Identification: Derive key features from metadata to deduce travel preferences. Model Creation: Develop and train predictive models to generate Travel DNA insights. Testing: Validate model accuracy and iterate based on outcomes. Product Collaboration: Integrate models into company platforms with product teams. Optimization: Ensure models are scalable and optimized for timely processing. Model Interpretability: Provide clear insights and communicate outcomes to diverse stakeholders. Industry Awareness: Stay updated with data science and machine learning advancements. Ethical Practices: Uphold user privacy and promote ethical data usage. Documentation: Maintain clear records of methods and results. Stakeholder Engagement: Share insights with management and cross-functional teams. Feedback Integration: Collaborate with UX/UI teams to refine models based on user feedback.

title: Creative Helper
longText: CREATIVE HELPER Mine Marketing üîπ–óa—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω—è: $500-700 üîπ–õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü—ñ—è: Ukraine (Remote) Hey there! Are you passionate about all things social? Do you want to work for a company that's always ahead of the curve? Then you're in luck because Mine Marketing is looking for a Creative Helper (Creative Assistant)! Requirements: - You must be obsessed with social media and up-to-date on the latest trends to ensure that our ads stand out from the crowd. - Experience in Marketing / Project Management is preffered; - You must have fluent or Advanced-level English to communicate effectively. Bonus points if you're fluent in jokes and emojis :) - Additional experience in platforms like FB, TikTok, Google, Snapchat, YouTube, Taboola, or Native would be highly regarded. - Experience working with AdSpy and similar platforms is a great plus; - Exceptional copywriting, communication, and attention to detail are necessary to communicate effectively. Typos are not our friends. - Ability to think outside of the box and come up with new ideas and solutions is a must. Responsibilities: - As a Creative Assistant, you'll be responsible for assisting Creative Team Lead to help achieve acquisition targets for our clients. You're the magic maker! - You'll assist manage daily tasks and prioritize them accordingly. - You'll spend a lot of time on competitor research, diving deep into AdSpy, Trend Following & Applying that into creatives. Let's see what they're doing and do it better! - You must understand how to identify targeting personas and create direct response copy that speaks to their pain points and craft hooks and CTAs accordingly. - You'll produce fresh, innovative work that translates complex ideas into digital experiences for visually sophisticated audiences. We‚Äôre gonna make something amazing! - Finding the latest tools to improve workflow and reach the best results ever. Always stay ahead of the game! What we offer: - Opportunities for professional development and personal growth üöÄ - Competitive salary, reasonable and fair working conditions üíµ - A ridiculously awesome team and work environment üéâ - Training opportunities, including paid courses and webinars üíª - Remote working conditions üè† - Generous PTO and Holidays üå¥ Join us and let's make some social media magic happen! Apply now!

title: Network Engineer (Shifts) IRC209467
longText: NETWORK ENGINEER (SHIFTS) IRC209467 GlobalLogic üîπ–õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü—ñ—è: Ukraine(Kyiv,Lviv) (Remote) Description: Harmonic is a leading provider of innovative broadband solutions that deliver video, voice, and data to communications providers around the world. GL team participates in the development, QA, and support of several generations of such solutions. Requirements: Education: Bachelor/Master in Computer Science, Electronic Engineering, Telecommunications or equivalent; Expertise in IP network switching and routing protocols, TCP/IP stack is highly desirable; Hands-on experience with Linux; Superior problem-solving, analytical and communication skills; A strong understanding of IP protocols and telecommunication/cable operator networks; Experience in a technical support organization in a broadcast, communication, satellite, cable, telco or a similar domain; Experience with bash/python scripting; Experience with Salesforce, Jira, Confluence; English level ‚Äì upper-intermediate; ! Ability to work on flexible hours. Responsibilities: Responsible for integration and support in assigned product areas to Harmonic‚Äôs regional customer support engineers and, when necessary, customers who are diagnosing, troubleshooting, repairing and debugging complex system problems involving Harmonic and associated equipment; Report and track design, reliability and maintenance problems or bugs to R&D engineering groups; Assist, and implement both hardware and software upgrades to the existing Harmonic customer base.

title: Chief Executive Officer for AI product
text: Chief Executive Officer for AI product üè¢–ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω—ñ—è: WizardsDev üìç–õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü—ñ—è: Ukraine (Remote)
longText: CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER FOR AI PRODUCT WizardsDev üîπ–õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü—ñ—è: Ukraine (Remote) REQUIREMENTS ‚Äî 3+ years of experience as C-level; ‚Äî Proven success in securing investments from venture capital (VC) sources; ‚Äî Experience in startups and deep understanding of AI specifics; ‚Äî Development and implementation of strategies for sustainable growth; ‚Äî Strong leadership skills and experience working with diverse teams; ‚Äî English C1. RESPONSIBILITIES ‚Äî Development and execution of strategies for growth and sustainability. ‚Äî Interaction with investors and securing funding. ‚Äî Organization of efficient business processes. ‚Äî Development and motivation of staff. ‚Äî Establishment of strategic relationships with clients, partners, and investors. WE OFFER ‚Äî creative and friendly team without hierarchy within; ‚Äî opportunity to work remotely in the office, it‚Äôs up to you; ‚Äî 18 days of paid vacation per year and 5 days of sick leave; ‚Äî offer compensation for gym memberships; ‚Äî compensation for educational platforms and English language classes; ‚Äî corporate English language courses and speaking club; ‚Äî coverage for psychotherapy sessions on the pleso.me platform. üöÄ If you are a visionary and accomplished CEO eager to make a significant impact in a dynamic organization, we would love to connect with you. Become a key player in our startup journey!

title: Technical Writer
longText: TECHNICAL WRITER Uni Agency üîπ–õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü—ñ—è: Ukraine (Remote) Uni Agency is a team of experts specialized in 3D graphics and website creation. We are exceptionally qualified, experienced and competent in our field of work. We can teach you to understand our niche specialty in each and every particular matter. 3D graphics, visualization, modeling, customization and far more will be waiting for you in our extraordinary company. We're seeking an enthusiastic Technical Writer to our team. Requirements: ‚Ä¢ 2+ years of experience in creating documentation for projects or systems; ‚Ä¢ Strong written and verbal communication skills including technical writing skills; ‚Ä¢ Knowledge of relevant tools such as JIRA, Confluence, Google services, etc; ‚Ä¢ Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams; ‚Ä¢ Upper-intermediate and higher spoken and written English. Responsibilities: ‚Ä¢ Gathering data about the project from any sources ‚Äî website, confluence, JIRa, Figma, test cases, code, teams etc. ; ‚Ä¢ Analyzing, researching, and defining the set of rules and conditions for any existing feature; ‚Ä¢ Structure the existing articles and create project documentation of all levels, how steps, use cases, visual and technical documentation, and anything else; ‚Ä¢ Communicate with different departments and teams to gather information; ‚Ä¢ Update existing and created documentation, and ensure that articles are up-to-date. We offer: ‚Ä¢ Competitive salary; ‚Ä¢ Interesting world-class projects based on WebGL; ‚Ä¢ Flexible work schedule; ‚Ä¢ Stable payment of wages 2 times a month; ‚Ä¢ Friendly young team, healthy atmosphere and community; ‚Ä¢ Opportunities for professional growth and development; ‚Ä¢ Paid sick leave and vacation; ‚Ä¢ English training (you can improve your English with us).
